display_long_description:
Armed with color-coded guns, you’ll face a diverse  array of targets. Match red with red, blue with blue, and combine both guns for purple. Sounds simple? Think again! With multiple game modes and an increasing level of challenge, Flare Frenzy will keep you hooked as you strive for the perfect run.
[media]
# 🎮 Multiple Game Modes

🔫 **Classic Mode:** Match colors and maintain accuracy. Each miss and wrong match will cost you life points—how long can you survive?

⌛ **Timed Mode**: Compete against the clock and score as high as possible in just 60 seconds.

🪅 **Frenzy Mode:** Brace yourself for a horde of fast-moving, unpredictable targets. Speed and precision are your best friends!

**🛠️Custom Mode:** An exciting  challenge of your own making! Design your experience and reach your best score.

[media]
# 💺Designed for Comfort
Whether you’re new to VR or a seasoned pro, Flare Frenzy has you covered. With both VR and MR modes, you can enjoy a customizable experience that reduces motion sickness and keeps you in control.

# 🗺️Compete with the World
Challenge yourself and others with our global leaderboard. Show off your skills, outscore your rivals, and claim your place as the ultimate arcade sharpshooter!

# 🏟️Different Arenas, Different Challenges
Flare Frenzy offers different arenas to keep your experience fresh and not boring at all! Show your skills in a variety of arenas and prove you’re the best wherever you shoot.


[media]
